data.title: Raising Victor Vargas
meta_keywords: Raising Victor Vargas how to watch
Raising Victor Vargas where to watch
data.meta_description: Though he talks a big game at the local pool, Vargas' true experience is nothing more than a string of romantic rejections. After Vargas fails to improve his  reputation by bedding an overweight classmate, he chooses a more difficult target. Watch now!
data.text: On New York City’s Lower East Side, Dominican teen and aspiring ladies’ man Victor Vargas (Victor Rasuk) has nothing but girls on his mind. Though he talks a big game at the local pool, Vargas’ true experience amounts to nothing more than a string of romantic rejections. After Vargas fails to improve his abysmal reputation by bedding an overweight classmate, he chooses a much more difficult target – the stunning and stuck-up Judy Ramirez (Judy Marte).
